metadata.name: MOTHER'S DAY 2022: An NFT for 2023
metadata.description:
This NFT is the gateway to gifting your MOTHER something special on Mother's Day 2023. The more you hodl the better utilities your mother & your family will enjoy.

3 simple things to do to make your mother happy:

RESPECT her well: The most important thing, you should always do even if you don't do anything else, is to respect her.

LOVE her unconditionally: Always love her no matter what choices she makes for herself for her looks, her life, her career or hobby.

LISTEN to her actively: Don't just be quiet when she's talking, actually¬†listen¬†to her. Active listening involves asking questions and really responding to what she's saying. This tells her that you're really paying attention.

‚ù§Ô∏èüôè Infinite Love Unlimited Gratitude to all the mothers in the universe. You all are the bestest MAA for so many PARIVARs around the globe.

#HappyMothersDay2022
